mybox.title: AC Charging Stations
mybox.subtitle: Premium Quality and European Components
mybox.description: We developed premium MyBox charging stations specifically for corporate and commercial use. They are designed for high-frequency usage and feature robust construction. Reliability is guaranteed by components from renowned European manufacturers. The MyBox portfolio includes a wide range of models, from wall-mounted wallboxes to freestanding dual stations.

plus.description: Smart charging station with advanced connectivity, remote management and dynamic power control. Ideal for corporate environments.

profi.description: Robust station designed for heavy use and demanding commercial environments. Durable construction for outdoor installations.

post.description: Freestanding pedestal station with two charging outputs. Perfect for parking lots and public spaces.

czech.title: Czech Development
czech.description: Fully designed and manufactured in CZ

alpitronic.title: DC Fast Chargers
alpitronic.subtitle: Premium Fast Charging by Alpitronic
alpitronic.description: As an authorized Alpitronic partner, we offer top-tier Hypercharger DC fast charging stations. These stations represent the pinnacle of fast charging with power up to 400 kW. Modular architecture ensures maximum availability and easy maintenance.

hyc50.description: Compact fast charger ideal for smaller spaces. Offers flexible installation and reliable 50 kW performance for everyday use.

hyc200.description: Versatile fast charging station with up to 200 kW power. Scalable architecture for public infrastructure and highway networks.

hyc400.description: Portfolio flagship with up to 400 kW power. Ultra-fast charging for minimum downtime and maximum customer satisfaction.

usp.title: Your Reliable Partner for Electromobility
usp.description: We are a Czech manufacturer of charging stations with our own development and production. We offer complete solutions from design to service with emphasis on quality and reliability.

features.czechManufacturer: Czech manufacturer with own development and production
features.premiumMaterials: Premium materials – tempered glass and stainless steel
features.cloudManagement: Cloud platform for remote station management
features.ocppProtocol: OCPP protocol support for integration with any backend system
features.completeService: Complete service from design through installation to maintenance

usp.seoText1: MyBox charging stations represent a reliable solution for charging electric vehicles in the Czech Republic. Our stations are developed and manufactured directly in the Czech Republic with emphasis on quality and longevity.
usp.seoText2: Thanks to modular construction and use of components from renowned European manufacturers, we guarantee high reliability and easy maintenance. All our stations support the OCPP protocol for seamless integration.
usp.seoText3: We offer a complete portfolio from home wallboxes through corporate solutions to public infrastructure including Alpitronic DC fast chargers with power up to 400 kW.

faq.title: Have Questions?
faq.subtitle: We've prepared answers to the most frequently asked questions about charging stations and electromobility.
faq.notFound: Didn't find the answer to your question?

acVsDc.question: What's the difference between AC and DC charging?
acVsDc.answer: AC charging uses alternating current and goes through the vehicle's onboard charger. It's suitable for longer parking (at home, at work) with power of 3.7–22 kW. DC charging delivers direct current directly to the battery, enabling fast charging with power of 50–400 kW – ideal for traveling and short stops.

installationTime.question: How long does charging station installation take?
installationTime.answer: Installation of a home wallbox station typically takes 2–4 hours. For corporate installations with multiple stations and electrical modifications needed, expect 1–3 days. DC fast chargers require more extensive preparation and installation can take several days including construction work.

homeCharging.question: Can I install a charging station at home?
homeCharging.answer: Yes, home charging is the most convenient way to charge an electric vehicle. For installation, you need sufficient electrical connection capacity (minimum 3×25A for an 11 kW station). We recommend consulting with our technician who will assess your electrical installation options.

chargingCost.question: How much does charging an electric vehicle cost?
chargingCost.answer: Charging costs depend on electricity price and battery capacity. With home charging at €0.20/kWh, charging a 60 kWh battery costs approximately €12, which corresponds to a range of 300–400 km. With solar panels or night tariffs, costs can be even lower.

warranty.question: What warranty do you provide on charging stations?
warranty.answer: We provide a standard 3-year warranty on all MyBox stations. Under warranty, we ensure free service and replacement of defective parts. We also offer extended warranties and service contracts for corporate customers with guaranteed response times.

cloudPlatform.question: What does the MyBox cloud platform enable?
cloudPlatform.answer: The cloud platform provides remote monitoring and station management, consumption and cost overview, access rights configuration, automatic billing and integration with accounting systems. We also support dynamic load management for optimal use of available connection capacity.
